name: 科學文獻探討（二）
description: (1) 探索科學文獻中，關於當代能源科學製程、分析方法、合成步驟，以及能源教育的前言發展。(2) 以結合文獻閱讀、口頭報告、書面重點整理，加上課堂問答的實作形式，來幫助學生探究當代能源科學相關的最新見解。
goals: Help students to develop the ability in conducting a good scientific presentation.
Help students to develop a procedure in accessing a scientific journal article.
Learning the update development in energy and energy education.
syllabus:
(1)  Arrangingstudents’ presentation schedule.

(2)  Identifymodern energy topics for the subsequent selection.

(3)  Providing thelogistics of carrying out oral presentations.

(4)  Managing classparticipation at each Q&A section. 

Selected energy topics: globalenergy and climate change, other energy resource and consequence, solar energyand photosynthesis in biology, solar energy conversion by manmade device, wateroxidation, hydrogen production, hydride generation and carbon dioxide reduction,hydrogen storage, and fuel cell

methodologies.note: 團體合作研讀指定期刊文章
